name: Pappy
descriptions: Pappy is a pessimistic inhabitant of Big Town in the year 2277.
Pappy claims to have come from Little Lamplight with his girlfriend Bittercup and the others hoping to find Big Town, a nice town with plenty of food and protection.

topics.topic_text: Is there anyone around here who can repair my stuff?
You came here with Bittercup, right?
topics.response_text: I told her things would be safe here. How was I supposed to know all those stories were bunk? Then she dumped me, called me a liar.

topics.topic_text: Do you have any traders in town? Any doctors?
topics.response_text: We've got two things to do in this town: suck and die. No one ever makes it in this place. You won't find any stores to loot here.{Pappy is angry, frustrated, and sullen. He's suspicious of the player's motives for being here.}

topics.topic_text: This place looks like a ghost town.
topics.response_text: Yeah, you're telling me. Everything that could go wrong, goes wrong. The Super Mutants and Slavers seem to take turns beating the crap out of us.{(WK) The residents of Big Town are constantly harried.}

topics.topic_text: Where did you people come from, anyway?
topics.response_text: Most of us came from Little Lamplight. We got too old, so they kicked us out. Brats.{(WK) The residents of Big Town are bitter about getting ejected from the relative safety of Lamplight.}
That big moron, Flash, thinks he's in charge. All he really does is listen to what Red tells him. That's all anyone here really does.
Everyone's dead or dying. Now leave me alone.
We're all watching you waiting to learn something. Well. Get on with it already!

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for a woman named Red. Sticky promised me some caps...
topics.response_text: Red was the only decent person in this hellhole, and the Mutants took her in the raid. That Sticky is a doofus, but I bet Red will cover his debts.{upset}

topics.topic_text: Do you know where the Super Mutants took your friends?
topics.response_text: Well if you feel like dying, go right on ahead. They're up there at some police station near Germantown. Good luck. You're gonna need it.{paranoid, angry, and defeatist}

topics.topic_text: Don't lose hope. Do you know where the Super Mutants are located?
topics.response_text: They took 'em north to that old police station... in Germantown... No use in going up there though. They've already been eaten, or worse, by now.{pessimistic}

topics.topic_text: If you don't care about your friends, then I guess I won't rescue them.
topics.response_text: Hold on there! I never said I didn't care. I just know there isn't anyone foolish enough to go up to Germantown. Why, you think you can rescue them?{pessimist being called on his bluff}

topics.topic_text: No, I'm not going to rescue your friends.
topics.response_text: I knew it. You're just like all the others.{let down and depressed and pessimistic}

topics.topic_text: I'll think about it, but I can't rescue your friends now.
topics.response_text: I knew it. You're just like all the others.{let down and depressed and pessimistic}

topics.topic_text: I'll rescue your friends just to see the smile on your face when they return!
topics.response_text: Hah! Think you're all that, huh? Well, it's your own funeral. I certainly won't be attending.{pessimistic}

topics.topic_text: I got what it takes to rescue your friends, but it's going to cost you.
topics.response_text: Just what I thought. You're a mercenary. We don't need you. Go on up there to die if you like. But don't say you're doing it for us!{pessimistic and bitter}
None of your business. Go bother someone else.

conversation.response_text: I don't know what good it will do, but thanks Timebomb. I'll ask you about it later.{Pappy is cynical about how much trouble the barricades are worth.}
That takes forever, Shorty. Several hours at least.{Pappy is upset at the possibility of more work.}
Yeah. We keep moving until there's no space left. Then, it's game over.{Un-assured that there is any hope, Pappy remains melancholy.}
We're all going to die!{pessimist saying "good bye"}
What the hell?! Oh it's you.{anger softening when he realizes who it is}
I didn't think that'd work!{(cheering) in an excited cheering mob}

combat.response_text: If I'm going to die, I'm taking one of you with me!
